Headline: #87 87th Temporary Reroute at 87th/Central Park
ShortDescription: 87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#87 87th buses are temporarily rerouted via 87th, Southwest Highway, Lawndale and 87th: due to, street blockage near 87th/Central Park.

Headline: Forest Park-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with delays after an earlier sick customer on a train and Cumberland. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Forest Park-bound Blue Line trains are operating with residual delays after an earlier sick customer on a train and Cumberland.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
